articles.author: Etan Vlessing
articles.title: ‘American Idol’ Music Supervisor Robin Kaye and Her Husband Die in Double Homicide - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Los Angeles police found a couple in an Encino home on Monday with gunshot wounds, before the apparent murder victims were declared dead by fire department paramedics.
articles.content:
Longtime American Idolmusic supervisor Robin Kaye and her husband, Thomas Deluca, have been killed following an apparent double homicide.
